ID: d50b00a6-7dc4-a34e-3032-f7f7ad8d191a Version Independent ID: b10edb8b-1fe4-424b-3e1b-c8452a1f05f3 Content: azureml.pipeline.steps.EstimatorStep class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-pipeline-steps/azureml.pipeline.steps.EstimatorStep.yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @j-martens Microsoft Alias: jmartens

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting this. There was a formatting issue in the docstring preventing parameters from rendering in HTML. The fix is in and will appear in next release in a few weeks.
